Uses of Class
com.characterforming.jrte.GearboxException

  • Packages that use GearboxException 
    Package Description
    com.characterforming.jrte
    Main package provides the transduction factory class Jrte and the interfaces that define the application integration points.

    • Uses of GearboxException in com.characterforming.jrte

      Subclasses of GearboxException in com.characterforming.jrte 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TargetBindingException
      Thrown when there is a problem binding target effectors to a transduction
      class  TargetNotFoundException
      Thrown when the target class cannot be instantitated using a default constructor
      Methods in com.characterforming.jrte that throw GearboxException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IInput Jrte.input(char[][] input)
      Set up a transduction input source with a sequence of Unicode and signal ordinals.
      IInput Jrte.input(java.io.InputStream infile, java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
      Set up a transduction input source with a raw file and charset decoder as input source.
      IInput Jrte.input(java.io.Reader infile)
      Set up a transduction input source with a text file as input source.
      static void Jrte.main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Default Jrte runtime transduces System.in to System.out, with an optional nil signal as input prefix.
      ITransduction Jrte.transduction(ITarget target)
      Bind an unbound target instance to a new transduction.
